INSERT INTO require (require_no, member_no, title, content, image, want_price, company) VALUES (#{requireNo}, #{memberNo}, #{title}, #{content}, #{image}, #{price}, #{company})
mapper.select: SELECT page, requireno, memberno, title, content, image, regdate, comments, price, company FROM (SELECT Ceil(rownum / 9) AS page, requireno, memberno, title, content, image, regdate, comments, price, company FROM (SELECT require_no AS requireNo, member_no AS memberNo, title, content, image, To_char(regdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS regdate, comments, want_price AS price, company FROM require ORDER BY require_no DESC)) WHERE page = #{page}
SELECT require_no as requireNo, member_no as memberNo, title, content, image, To_char(regdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as regdate, want_price as price, company FROM require WHERE require_no = #{requireNo}
